column1: WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in the sea areas around the island during
the  afternoon  or  night.  Showers  may  occur  at  several  places  in  the  sea  areas  off  the  coast
extending from Colombo to Hambantota via Galle in the morning too.
Winds will be westerly to south-westerly and wind speed will be (30-40) kmph.

ind speed can increase up to 50 kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending from
Galle to Batticaloa via Matara, Hambantota and Pottuvil.
